column3: A risk or possibility or uncertainty of negative effects, impacts, or consequences.
column7: Risks can be associated with one or more different concepts such as purpose, processing, personal data, technical or organisational measure.

column3: The consequence(s) possible or arising as a side-effect of specified context

Risk management refers to a coordinated set of activities and methods that is used to direct an organization and to control the many risks that can affect its ability to achieve objectives.  The term risk management also refers to the programme that is used to manage risk. This programme includes risk management principles, a risk management framework, and a risk management process.
column7: Data Protection Impact Assessments as per GDPR art 35, other Privacy Impact Assessments, threat severity assessment https://www.cnil.fr/en/privacy-impact-assessment-pia

column3: Measures intended to mitigate, minimise, or prevent risk.
